extendedInfo.description: Track swim times and view swimming time standards. Share swimming race times with friends and family using your favorite social networking tools like Facebook, Twitter, text messaging, and Email.FEATURES- Multiple swimming time standards and motivational times available with ability to customize- Time conversion (CSI Conversion Standards)- Import/Export swimmer race times- Race Time Chart- Swim race types include Freestyle, Breaststroke, Backstroke, Butterfly, Individual Medley, Freestyle Relay, and Medley Relay.- Long Course Meters (LCM), Short Course Meters (SCM), Short Course Yards (SCY), Open Water Swim (OWS) supported- Record and log swim times for multiple swimmers- Best race times list for each swimmer- Share swimming race times with friends and family via Facebook, Twitter, Email, Text Message, and more!TIME STANDARDS AVAILABLEUSA Swimming- 2009-2012 A/B Age Group Motivational Time Standards- 2012 U.S. Olympic Team Trials- 2011 ConocoPhillips National Championships Time Standards- 2011 Speedo Junior Nationals Time Standards  USA Swimming LSC- Adirondack- Arizona- Central California JO- Colorado- Connecticut- Far Western- Florida- Georgia- Gulf- Hawaii- Illinois- Indiana- Iowa- Kentucky- Louisiana- Metropolitan- Michigan- Middle Atlantic- Midwestern- Minnesota- Mississippi- Missouri Valley- New England- New Jersey- New Mexico- Niagara- North Carolina- Ohio- Oregon- Pacific- Pacific Northwest- Potomac Valley- San Diego-Imperial- Sierra Nevada- South Carolina- Southeastern- Southern California- Texas- Utah- Virginia- Wisconsin- WyomingYMCA- YMCA 2012 National Championships- YMCA Great Lakes Zone- YMCA Illinois Missouri- YMCA Iowa- YMCA Michigan- YMCA New Jersey- YMCA Pacific North- YMCA Southeast Ohio West Virginia- YMCA WisconsinUSA Swimming Zone Championships- Central Zone Champ Cuts- Eastern Zone LCM Age Group- Eastern Zone LCM Super Sectionals- Eastern Zone Championships- Western Zone Age GroupNCAA- NCAA Division I- NCAA Division II- NCAA Division IIIBRITISH SWIMMING- ASA East Region- ASA Essex- ASA Midland Region- ASA National Champ Age Group Youth- ASA NDSA Champ- ASA NER Champ- ASA South East Region- ASA UK Olympic Time Trials- European MastersCANADA- Canada SNC Champ- Aus Championship- Aus Brisbane Sprint Champ- Aus Brisbane Sr Metro Champ- Aus McDonalds Qld Sprint Champ- Aus Queensland- Aus VictorianIRELAND- Irish Age GroupNEW ZEALAND- New Zealand Mayfair Age- New Zealand State OpenSOUTH AFRICA- South Africa Age GroupSPAIN- Spain National Champ- Spain Valenciana ChampHONG KONG- HKASA Hong KongOTHER- Arabian Falcons Swimming Association (AFSA)- Bahamas Swimming Federation- CHSAA Colorado HS- FINA Olympic- FINA World Masters Champ- VZF Vlaamse Zwemfederatie- Jefferson Swim League JSL- IHSA Illinois- MHSAA Michigan- Michigan Team Swim League (MTSL)- MYAS Midwest Regional Swim Meet- MSHSAA Missouri HS- NCSA Junior National- New Mexico State High School- NWAL Northwest Aquatic League- NWSC Northwest Swim Circuit Austin TX- RMAL Richmond- Speedo Champ Northwest Section- Straehle Invitational- USMS Motivational- USMS National Q Times- West Michigan WMSL- WPIALFinally, there is a easier way to track swim times and share with friends and family. Goodbye pencil and paper!Need a time standard added? Please send requests to support@myswimmingtimes.comQ&AQ: How do I delete a Swimmer, Race Time, or Time Standard that I no longer want?A: On the Swimmer, Race Time, or Time Standard list simply LONG PRESS on the race time and you will be prompted with a menu to 'Edit' or 'Delete' the item. Select 'Delete' to delete the item.

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Excellent app for storing and easy access to all my daughters times,  if possible could north west regional times (uk) be added.
reviews.author: nicola hope

reviews.title: kjgress
reviews.comment: Just downloaded this app; great idea but all the time standards are old; 2011 and 2012; nothing here from March 2013 or newer and all the old standards are making the standards list long and hard to use; fine for keeping track of swims, but useless for checking for time standards.
reviews.author: Karen Gress

reviews.comment: Nice app so far, but I don\'t see whatever the new chart feature is in the update. It would be nice to have a line chart that charts a swimmers progress in a race over time. Also I need Arkansas time standards. Thank you keep up the good work!
reviews.author: Stacy Discenza

reviews.title: Bahamas Swimming times
reviews.comment: I just started using this app a few days ago. So far, so good. I was really impressed when I emailed the developer to add time standard for the Bahamas as well as CISC and CCCAN.  I received a reply within the same day and an update to the app shortly thereafter with all the time standards I requested.  Thank you so much.....I will certainly spread the word!!
reviews.author: Kristi Wong

reviews.title: Great app just having trouble importing.
reviews.comment: The app works great.  Everything we need to track our kids times.  I am just having trouble importing the .CVS file to another phone.  I am getting a failed validation error.  Samsung Galaxy phone. Thanks,
reviews.author: Scott Nelson

reviews.title: Transferring times to a new phone
reviews.comment: My samsung galaxy s3 will not import my swimmers times.  Any suggestions. I saved file from old phone onto computer as csv file.  Saved file onto new phone (s3)  and the file is there but the app will not upload it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Nice app
reviews.author: Barb Dybowski

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Great app thanks. One improvement would be if you could add splits and then look at them as 50\'s or 100\'s time splits. also I don\'t know how to import a swimmers file.
reviews.author: Tom Stickle

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Really impressed. Could do with some more irish and ik standards and the ability to use converted times against those standards.
reviews.author: Jonathan Wiffen

reviews.title: Brilliant!
reviews.comment: Thanks for adding Irish Age Groups. It\'s really useful. Love the graph that shows my improvement. Really cool. I\'m going to show my swim coaches. Thanks!
reviews.author: Emma McElderry

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Need it for iPad I will stick with android just to stay with this app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: This app is so helpful in keeping tack of my progress and motivating me by showing how close I am to cut times!
reviews.author: Josh Arbogast

reviews.title: Excellent swim app
reviews.comment: This is really easy to use and the creator is very responsive to queries.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: This is a great app but...how difficult would it be to add cloud backup like dropbox? Would be nice to back everything up in case of those phone technical difficulties!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Thank you for the metro time standard. Really useful app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Few issues
reviews.comment: Overall GREAT..Problems are level times are wrong for Missouri valley they should be in scy.  Also if phone crashes bye bye data! That is a pain.  But I like this app. 5 if fixed
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Handy little app.
reviews.comment: Useful and easy to use.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple and Easy to use
reviews.comment: It seems to work well, but it\'s missing the Canada East Coast Championship Times? I suppose that\'s ok since there are some many different times to cover.   It does need some more features, but other than that it\'s a great app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Easy to use
reviews.comment: This is a really easy program to use. Would like to know how to get more Australian (Qld) time stds added thought.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Grrreat
reviews.comment: Does what I want, better than some if the paid ones I have tried on my iPhone. Need to update the UK national time standards now though to get the 5th star.
reviews.author: A Google User
